{"blocks":[{"key":"f1qda","text":"Elute in   EB buffer (elution buffer), incubate at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"4s3lv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"BB9CCB2E7EC511EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB9CCBBB7EC511EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"35","duration":600,"error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BB9CCC767EC511EC859B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck38v","text":"Check that there is liquid in your tube, throw away the column and close your tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e96v9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8sdoa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7sa48","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4os4l","text":"Continue immediately with the purification or stop here and purify later.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7k2f4","text":"To continue with purification, take MinElute columns out of the fridge while the PCR is running.  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6soqk","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"49o1n","text":"To stop and purify later, put the strips into the fridge (if stored for max. 1 day) or freezer (if stored for multiple days) after the PCR is done. For the purification, take the MinElute columns out of the fridge in time so they can reach room temperature until PB buffer and libraries are added. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5fs5","text":"Label the 1.5 ml EB tube and aliquot: [# of samples]×35 µl plus 10%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq9ka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j8gk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a2dai","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"etqgc","text":"Steps 12 to 14 only apply if you have 2x split the PCR reaction.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oc2q","text":"Prepare PE (wash) buffer by adding ethanol and aliquoting to 50 ml tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
